vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀγγᾰρ-εύω,
press one to serve as an ἄγγαρος, generally, press into service, NT.Matt.5.41,[Refs 3rd c.BC+]:—passive, to be pressed into service, [Refs 4th c.BC+]: metaphorically, to be constrained, [Refs 6th c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to force, compel, press into service in military or civil matters
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to force, compel, press into service in military or civil matters
to press, or compel, force another to go somewhere, or carry some burden, Mt. 5:41; 27:32; Mk. 15:21*
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: sai buộc; bắt; bắt buộc; ép buộc
